meanings.definition: To remove software or an application from a computer or device.
meanings.sent1: I uninstalled the game from my phone.
meanings.sent2: She uninstalled the unnecessary program from her laptop.
meanings.sent3: After I uninstalled the app, my computer felt lighter!
meanings.sent4: His decision to uninstalled the software was like decluttering his digital space.
meanings.sent5: The act of uninstalled the program left a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I uninstalled the outdated software.
meanings.sent2: They uninstalled the app after it caused issues.
meanings.sent3: When he uninstalled the game, it was like saying goodbye to an old friend.
meanings.sent4: The idea of uninstalled the program felt like closing a chapter.
meanings.sent5: The uninstalled files were no longer taking up space on the computer.
